attributes.action: Stop Trafford Council from charging extra to collect garden waste.
attributes.additional_details: This is particularly unfair on the frail and disabled as they could struggle to transport rubbish to their local tip.
attributes.background:
Trafford Council have stated that from the 5th June 2017 we will be charged extra if we want our garden waste collecting. 

They have also not offered to reduce our current council tax to reflect this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your council:

https://democratic.trafford.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
